name: Banzo - Marks of Slavery
description: Banzo - Marks of Slavery is a turn-based strategy and resource management game. Command the Vulture's Quilombo, at Brazil imperial age, and be responsible for organizing, producing food, protecting the quilombo, attacking farms and releasing enslaved people.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Pentium or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or equivalent Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon or equivalent Storage: 800 MB available space
